coreAtributes.name: Lloyd's Beacon
coreAtributes.description:
#IF pc.getHomeWorldLocation().toString() == 'MUSEUM' #THEN A strange artifact. Who knows what it does?
Well, only one way to find out!

The name "χρϡ" is engraved on the handle. #ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions() == 'NONE' #THEN The artifact doesn't seem to respond to your aura at the moment... #ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions() == 'INCOMING_ONLY' #THEN This intricate magical device grants the user the ability to return to a set location.

It seems to render itself inert when you're not holding it, concealing its nature as an illegal artifact. #ELSEIF pc.getHomeWorldLocation().toString() != 'MUSEUM' #THEN This intricate magical device grants the user the ability to return to a set location.

replacementText.self:
You activate the artifact...
#IF pc.isAtHome() #THEN Nothing seems to happen...
#ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions() == 'NONE' #THEN Nothing seems to happen... #ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions() == 'OUTGOING_ONLY' #THEN Nothing seems to happen... #ELSE [##pc.setHomeLocation()] The beacon has been set at your current location.
#ENDIF

You activate the artifact...
#IF pc.getHomeWorldLocation().toString() == 'MUSEUM' #THEN Nothing seems to happen...


Glowing, cyan lettering is projected into the air, which reads:
Remove from the hands to return.
Remove from the wrist to set the beacon. #ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions()=='NONE' #THEN Nothing happens... #ELSEIF pc.getWorldLocation().getTeleportPermissions()=='INCOMING_ONLY' #THEN The world fades to black for a brief moment, and you feel yourself being pulled back by some strange, powerful force...
You find yourself standing where you were before using the artifact. #ELSE [##pc.returnToHome()]
The world fades to black for a brief moment...
#ENDIF
